casebody.data:
No. 956,

Misc.

Smith v. Illinois. Gerald W. Getty, Marshall J. Hartman and James J. Doherty for petitioner. William G. Clark, Attorney General of Illinois, for respondent.

App. Ct. Ill., 1st Dist. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted and case transferred to appellate docket.
